EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Boston - PAIR - Post Event - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Advanced Analytics Journey with Pivotal!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining us at the Pivotal Analytics and Innovation Roadshow (PAIR). To follow up on Alejandro’s previous note, we hope you came away with a clearer understanding of how analytics and data science can deliver better outcomes for your stakeholders.
We would love to hear your thoughts on the event and get any feedback you have to share. Please fill out this brief survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfztKiSlEFiDzBOUYcJaBiBM7Jk_phvCL97OS3GvNzDyuVFiQ/viewform]]>, your feedback is very important to us.
We’d be happy to speak with you about how to be successful with your own analytics initiatives. In the meantime here are some resources to start you on your journey:
- Presentation: The Art of the Possible with Analytics:AI, Machine Learning, Graph and More <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1mxna9IuutXZkxXcnhKRFk0TzA/view]]>
- Presentation: How to Make it Work for Your Organization <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_AWspwcuNySOVpfMW1ZT09DOFk/view]]>
- Webinar Replay: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation, with Neil Raden, Principal Analyst, Hired Brains Research <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation]]>
- White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]>
Demos and Code:
- Hands-on Workshop Code <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1mxna9IuutXbExLd0xTTXRIeU0/view]]> - Movement Classification Code <[[https://github.com/pivotal/moves]]> - Stock Prediction from 8-K Reports: Code <[[https://github.com/crawles/market-nlp]]> / App <[[http://marketnlp.cfapps.pez.pivotal.io/]]> - Twitter Sentiment Analysis: Code <[[https://github.com/crawles/twitter-nlp]]> / App <[[http://twitternlp.cfapps.pez.pivotal.io/]]> - Text Analytics on Greenplum Examples <[[https://github.com/scottcode/text_analytics_on_mpp]]> - SQL Magic <[[https://github.com/crawles/sql_magic]]> for Easy Database Interaction from Jupyter Notebooks
Also, take advantage of additional online resources for Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/data-science]]> and Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>. Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let’s build something meaningful!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
